/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the sidewalk, providing a panoramic view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
